column4: So when will dapper be stable? I am not asking for a release date here, I know it was already released!
I believe there is supposed to be a significant update in around two weeks.
so ubuntu is not denying that dapper was not really ready for a release yet?!
Or is that, what LTS means? If they keep up making this system better and better for the whole LTS periode, I would certainly welcome this strategy.
